search_integration.description: Search engine integration. Supports Meilisearch and Elasticsearch backends.

url.description: Search engine HTTP API URL. Used by both Meilisearch and Elasticsearch.

api_key.description: API key for authenticating with the search engine. For Meilisearch, this is the master or admin key. For Elasticsearch, this is an API key.

username.description: Username for Elasticsearch basic authentication. Only used when engine is elasticsearch and api_key is not set.

password.description: Password for Elasticsearch basic authentication. Only used when engine is elasticsearch and api_key is not set.
